SELECT r.idx,
a.accom_name, ar.room_name, la.large_area_name, r.check_in_date, r.check_out_date, r.adult_count, r.child_count, r.status, ai.file_name FROM tbl_reservation r, tbl_accom a, tbl_accom_room ar, tbl_large_area la, tbl_accom_images ai WHERE r.accom_room_idx = ar.idx AND ar.accom_idx = a.idx AND a.large_area_idx = la.idx AND a.idx = ai.accom_idx AND member_idx = #{member.idx} ORDER BY r.check_in_date DESC OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_reservation SET status='UCRN' WHERE member_idx = #{idx} AND status='CA' AND check_in_date < current_date
UPDATE tbl_reservation SET status='UCRY' WHERE member_idx = #{idx} AND status='UCRN' AND check_out_date < (current_date - (INTERVAL '1' YEAR))
mapper.select: SELECT r.idx, a.accom_name, ar.room_name, r.check_in_date, r.check_out_date, r.adult_count, r.child_count, m.name, m.phone, m.email, p.order_price, p.use_point, p.payment_price, p.insert_ts, r.status, ai.file_name, a.idx AS accom_idx, ar.idx AS accom_room_idx FROM tbl_reservation r, tbl_accom a, tbl_accom_room ar, tbl_member m, tbl_payment p, tbl_accom_images ai WHERE r.accom_room_idx = ar.idx AND ar.accom_idx = a.idx AND r.member_idx = m.idx AND r.idx = p.reservation_idx AND a.idx = ai.accom_idx AND r.idx = #{reser.idx} AND r.member_idx = #{member.idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET point = ((SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND is_plus = 'Y') -(SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND is_plus = 'N')) WHERE idx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT rf.idx, rf.payment_idx, rf.refund_price, rf.refund_point, rf.insert_ts FROM tbl_reservation rv, tbl_payment p, tbl_refund rf WHERE rv.idx = p.reservation_idx AND p.idx = rf.payment_idx AND rv.idx = #{idx}

SELECT r.idx, r.member_idx, r.accom_room_idx, a.accom_name, ar.room_name, ai.file_name FROM tbl_reservation r, tbl_accom a, tbl_accom_room ar, tbl_accom_images ai WHERE r.accom_room_idx = ar.idx AND ar.accom_idx = a.idx AND a.idx = ai.accom_idx AND r.idx = #{reser.idx} AND r.member_idx = #{member.idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_accom_review (reservation_idx, member_idx, accom_room_idx, grade1, grade2, grade3) VALUES (#{reservationIdx}, #{memberIdx}, #{accomRoomIdx}, #{grade1}, #{grade2}, #{grade3})
